title: Early stoppage of empirical antibiotic therapy at clinical improvement in paediatric leukaemia patients with high-risk febrile neutropenia (ESAT-HR-FN study): Study protocol of a single centre investigator initiated randomised open label non-inferiority trial
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Santhosh Kumar Kn, Santhosh Kumar Chellapuram, Shuvadeep Ganguly, Deepam Pushpam, Rupak Kumar Giri, Sameer Bakhshi
